events.name: Los Angeles Kings at Toronto Maple Leafs

highlights.headline: Los Angeles Kings vs. Toronto Maple Leafs: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Los Angeles Kings vs. Toronto Maple Leafs: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Los Angeles Kings vs. Toronto Maple Leafs: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Quinton Byfield scored on a one-timer 35 seconds into overtime to give the Los Angeles Kings a 4-3 victory over the injury-hit Toronto Maple Leafs on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Quinton Byfield scores in OT to lift the Kings past the Maple Leafs, 4-3

video.headline: Los Angeles Kings vs. Toronto Maple Leafs: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Los Angeles Kings vs. Toronto Maple Leafs: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Dallas Stars vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Dallas Stars vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Dallas Stars vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Jason Robertson had two goals and an assist, Casey DeSmith stopped 24 shots for his first shutout of the season, and the Dallas Stars beat the Montreal Canadiens 7-0 on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Robertson scores twice, Stars beat Canadiens 7-0 for fourth straight win

video.headline: Dallas Stars vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Dallas Stars vs. Montreal Canadiens: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

highlights.headline: Boston Bruins vs. Ottawa Senators: Game Highlights
highlights.description: Boston Bruins vs. Ottawa Senators: Game Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Boston Bruins vs. Ottawa Senators: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Tim Stützle scored twice in the third period and the Ottawa Senators beat Boston 5-3 on Thursday night to end the Bruins' seven-game win streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stützle scores 2 in 3rd period as Senators snap Bruins' 7-game win streak, 5-3

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Boston Bruins vs. Ottawa Senators: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

events.name: Anaheim Ducks at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Alex DeBrincat had two goals and an assist and the Detroit Red Wings beat the Anaheim Ducks 6-3 on Thursday night to end a three-game losing streak.
headlines.shortLinkText: Alex DeBrincat scores twice, Red Wings beat Ducks 6-3 to end 3-game slide

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Washington Capitals vs. Florida Panthers: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Brad Marchand reached 1,000 career points with two assists, Sam Reinhart scored twice and Florida Panthers beat the Washington Capitals 6-3 on Thursday.

events.name: Edmonton Oilers at Columbus Blue Jackets

highlights.headline: Blue Jackets hold off Oilers for 5-4 win
highlights.description: The Blue Jackets win 5-4 after a three-goal second period.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Blue Jackets hold off Oilers for 5-4 win ) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Mathieu Olivier scored two goals and had an assist, Charlie Coyle had a goal and two assists and the Columbus Blue Jackets extended their home winning streak to three games with a 5-4 victory over the Edmonton Oilers on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Olivier scores 2 goals to help lift Blue Jackets past Oilers 5–4

video.headline: Blue Jackets hold off Oilers for 5-4 win

tracking.trackingName: COM_NHL Highlight (Blue Jackets hold off Oilers for 5-4 win ) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Martin Necas had two goals and two assists, and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Buffalo Sabres 6-3 on Thursday night for their fifth straight win.

events.name: New York Islanders at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Jean-Gabriel Pageau scored a short-handed goal at 3:02 of overtime, and the New York Islanders beat the Vegas Golden Knights 4-3 on Thursday night for their third straight win.
headlines.shortLinkText: Pageau scores short-handed goal in OT as Islanders beat Golden Knights 4-3

video.headline: New York Islanders vs. Vegas Golden Knights: Game Highlights

highlights.headline: Jean-Gabriel Pageau nets winner for Islanders in OT
highlights.description: Jean-Gabriel Pageau takes it the length of the ice and scores a shorthanded goal as the Islanders outlast the Golden Knights in overtime.
